mods.name: Mission Selector
description:
Lets you switch through missions with configurable hotkeys like in Borderlands 3.

Features:
- jump forwards and backwards in the active missions
- configurable hotkeys

Notes:
- since this is often not the case with SDK mods: yes, this has multiplayer support if all players have it installed

Everything related to versions and their release notes can be found in the [changelog](https://github.com/RLNT/bl2_missionselector/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md).
If you found a bug or you have a feature request, please use our issue tracker linked below.
In case you need support, please join our [Discord](https://discordapp.com/invite/Q3qxws6).
mods.tagline: Lets you switch through missions with configurable hotkeys like in Borderlands 3.
